name: Eyealike
overview:
The Eyealike Visual Search (VS) Platform offers facial recognition, image detection, and video copyright surveillance capabilities for enterprises. The patent-pending technology takes a unique approach by enabling recognition of text, images, objects and movement, and facial features such as skin color, hair color, hair texture and style with smart, 3D model driven analysis to increase the speed, scale, and relevancy of searching rich media collections.

Eyealike Faces was designed to transform the online dating and social networking site experience with fun facial recognition and advanced search features, and Eyealike Copyright was designed to provide much-needed copyright protection for movie studios and websites with high volume user-generated content.
